translations: n.能力；容量；性能；生产量（capacity 的复数）

phrs.translation: 承载量；结果能力；产仔能力
环境容量，环境负荷量；环境承载力
存储容量；蓄电池容量；积聚电容
吞吐量；处理能力；处理容量
经济能力；财政的承受能力
极限承载力，极限承载量；轴承极限能力，承载量

sentences.sentence: The task facing medicine in the twenty-first century will be to redefine its limits even as it extends its capacities.
sentences.translation: 21世纪医学面临的任务将是重新定义其限制，即使它扩大了其能力。

sentences.sentence: In our times, human shrewdness has mastered the deep mysteries of the earth at a level far beyond the capacities of earlier peoples.
sentences.translation: 在我们这个时代，人类的精明已足以掌握地球的深层奥秘，其程度远远超过了早期人类的能力。

sentences.sentence: These days, safety regulations—not to mention the modern sports fan's desire for a good view and comfortable seat—tend to keep stadium capacities slightly lower.
sentences.translation: 如今，安全规定使体育场容量趋于下降，更不用说现代体育迷对良好视野和舒适座椅的渴望了。
